issue.title: [Rust] [Website] Create Rust-specific 0.17.0 blog post
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8614](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8614). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I wrote a brief blog post about DataFusion 0.17.0 [1] and Wes suggested that I post it on the Arrow blog. We might want to expand this to cover the  Rust implementation of Arrow in general and it might be a good opportunity to talk about things we want help with for the next release (such as integration testing, implementing a parquet writer, etc).

 [1] https://andygrove.io/2020/04/datafusion-0.17.0/

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8614?focusedCommentId=17094621) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I agree that having Rust blog posts on arrow.apache.org would be good for community development.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8614?focusedCommentId=17101113) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
I should be able to get to this soon now.

`[~paddyhoran]`, [~nevi_me] , `[~sunchao]` are there any particular topics you would like us to cover in this blog post?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8614?focusedCommentId=17101118) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
Nothing specific for the 0.17.0 release.  I think we should specifically call out the integration testing as our top goal for the next release and "rally the community" so to speak.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8614?focusedCommentId=17106272) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
I'm finally getting to this. I created a Google doc [1] and plan on working on it this week, probably wrapping it up over the weekend.

 

[1] https://docs.google.com/document/d/1z2oxdHqXJtl3CCvKOfEDRKHZuNV4-k92jwrAXAP933M/edit?usp=sharing

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8614?focusedCommentId=17107838) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
I fleshed this out a little more now.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8614?focusedCommentId=17157380) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Too late to do this now.
